amendment.description: To provide continuing appropriations in fiscal year 2011 and additional appropriations for disaster relief in fiscal years 2011 and 2012.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 656, by Unanimous Consent, withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 656 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S5922) To provide continuing appropriations in fiscal year 2011 and additional appropriations for disaster relief in fiscal years 2011 and 2012.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 656 proposed by Senator Reid.
